item.title: Web Developer Choice
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
A Web developer isn’t working as a software expert. He has some portfolio which is part of software inclusion. But if your development is so specific, you should go to a software developer for your particular solution. So the question arises is it not possible that a web developer doesn’t can able to handle the […]

The post Web Developer Choice appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
A Web developer isn’t working as a software expert. He has some portfolio which is part of software inclusion. But if your development is so specific, you should go to a software developer for your particular solution. So the question arises is it not possible that a web developer doesn’t can able to handle the software? But, don’t judge the same developer who offers you a low cost.
If you need the general website it may need a few days to complete. A general developer you can hire and I admitted I am also in that stage. But for the particular specific solution based on your choice. Preferably you should go to any developer who has also had a vast knowledge about databases. Different platforms such as API integration( XML, JSON), Custom Search Field, Accessible Security Ticket, MVC customization, etc.

The post Web Developer Choice appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Web Development Service
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
What service you really need that a web developer can do? Identity like (model, brand, celebrity, fan followers) a website with a related domain registration name will help you to follow many people in one end. If you are friendly or knowledgeable, share your thoughts and views with others. You can do it through a […]

The post Web Development Service appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
What service you really need that a web developer can do?
  • Identity like (model, brand, celebrity, fan followers) a website with a related domain registration name will help you to follow many people in one end.
  • If you are friendly or knowledgeable, share your thoughts and views with others. You can do it through a blog website or by making video tutorials
  • Thinking about a portfolio of a website or e-commerce website for business purposes. A developer can help you and give you the core customization you need.
  • For a nonprofitable business or advertise something, the landing page will help you on a low budget.
So, Better not to choose your service easy and fewer price bidders but concentrate on what the developers help you to build and what it could help you for a longer time.

The post Web Development Service appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

item.title: Database Management
item.dc:creator: Farhan Mullick
item.description:
Database management system(DBMS) is really important to find the query. The developers can interlink these queries to their front-end design architecture. So why need to fix some quotations to organize the database:  A database must have a relation with their id with primary and foreign keys  The relation database which has so many repetitive items […]

The post Database Management appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
Database management system(DBMS) is really important to find the query. The developers can interlink these queries to their front-end design architecture. So why need to fix some quotations to organize the database:
  1.  A database must have a relation with their id with primary and foreign keys
  2.  The relation database which has so many repetitive items much consider the separate identity of relationship
  3.  The non-relation database are more popular named as NoSQL and often use with name and description tag for Big Data and Cloud Computing
  4. The repetitive items must have some id, name, and category wise division for the relational database.
  5. Non-relational database that mainly works with real-time database SQL management and works for the deep learning and machine learning ideas and attributes
  6.  An inner join database for the relation of category-based structured SQL database works from the legendary times
The last thing we should know that if any developer doesn’t know about the database structure and items he/she wouldn’t be a good developer whether he is a master of the code or multiple platforms for coding.

The post Database Management appeared first on Farhan Mullick.

Website development […]

The post Digital Marketing Advanced appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
item.content:encoded:
Digital Marketing resources aren’t enough to reach the goal. Your dedication and service also depend on advertising and website and make the SEO well. Give the customer a prompt response is also value the services a lot.
  • Advertising and promotion with Google Adsense
  • Facebook promotion includes a lot of traffic to attach with.
  • Website development is a platform to engage with your services
  • SEO is a dynamic tool for link building and blog will give optimism for traffic.
  • Lead collection and digital marketing is the final part to fulfill your digital promotion.

The post Digital Marketing Advanced appeared first on Farhan Mullick.
